attributes.action: allow employees, like MPs (who travel free at taxpayer expense) and the self employed, to claim an allowance against income tax for the cost of travel to and from their home to their place of work.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Unlike the rest of the EU, the UK is the only country which pays it's MPs travel expenses out of taxpayer pounds and allows the self employed to charge the cost of travel to and from work to income tax, yet does not allow employees to claim any form of relief against their travel to and from work costs.
